entry.title: Blockchain Sleuths Link BALD Liquidity Rug Pull to Sam Bankman-Fried
entry.summary: The disgraced FTX founder is fingered by some who believe he removed liquidity from the BALD meme coin—before putting some back.

entry.title: Will Wall Street Interest in Bitcoin Scare Cypherpunks Away?
entry.summary: As big banks develop an appetite for crypto, privacy-centric users are increasingly wary of newcomers.

entry.title: Judge Refuses to Dismiss SEC Lawsuit Against Terraform Labs Despite Ripple Ruling
entry.summary: The ruling found that crypto "falls far short" of having the significance needed for Congress to review regulation.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: Hasbro Flirts with AI in Dungeons & Dragons as Game Sites Push Back
entry.summary: Hasbro taps Xplored to infuse AI into gameplay, adding real-time responses to player decisions.

entry.title: How an Ethereum Bot Used Uniswap to Save $5.4 Million From Curve Exploit
entry.summary: The MEV bot’s white-hat operator returned the funds to Curve Finance, which may have otherwise been lost to malicious hackers.

entry.title: Yuga Labs to Acquire Roar Studios for AI Expertise
entry.summary: Eric Reid, Roar Studios founder and CEO, will head Yuga Labs’ upcoming Otherside game.

entry.title: Barbie's Margot Robbie Says Bitcoin Is for 'Kens'—While Mattel Pushes NFTs
entry.summary: The actress dunked on the cryptocurrency as a stereotypically male conversation topic in a recent interview promoting "Barbie."

entry.title: AI Art Showdown: How Top Tools MidJourney, Stable Diffusion v1.5, and SDXL Stack Up
entry.summary: A clash of titans in AI tech has accelerated a generative image creation arms race. Which tool takes top honors?

entry.title: BALD Meme Coin on Coinbase Layer-2 Goes to Zero as Dev Pulls Liquidity
entry.summary: The BALD token exploded with popularity yesterday, but its deployers have since run off with millions of dollars in liquidity.

entry.title: Ron DeSantis Promises to End 'Biden's War on Bitcoin', Toss CBDC 'Into the Trash Can'
entry.summary: The Florida governor is among a number of presidential candidates who have expressed support for the leading cryptocurrency.

entry.title: Solana Is Only Network Ready for Gaming: Solana Foundation's Johnny Lee
entry.summary: Solana Foundation General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Solana network will tackle the scaling problem that blockchain games pose for the industry.

entry.title: DeFi Contagion? Curve Finance Exploit Ripples Across Industry
entry.summary: Smart contracts built using older Vyper versions are vulnerable to hacks, according to the programming language’s developers.

entry.title: Tether Reports $850 Million Q2 Profit, $72 Billion Exposure to US Treasuries
entry.summary: Altogether Tether has about $72.5 billion worth of U.S. Treasury Bills backing its USDT stablecoin, according to the report.

entry.title: SEC Charges Hex Founder Richard Heart With $1 Billion Unregistered Securities Offering
entry.summary: Hex founder Richard Heart and three entities have been charged today for allegedly conducting unregistered crypto asset securities offerings.

entry.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr: Bitcoin Energy Concerns Should Not Be Used as 'Smokescreen' to Limit Freedom
entry.summary: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. says opponents shouldn't use Bitcoin's climate concerns as an excuse to block people's "freedom to transact."

entry.title: Coinbase CEO Says SEC Wanted All Assets Except Bitcoin Delisted: Report
entry.summary: The regulator reportedly wanted Coinbase to cease trading all cryptocurrencies except Bitcoin prior to its legal action against the exchange.

entry.title: DeFi Exchange Curve Finance Confirms Various Ethereum Pools Hacked
entry.summary: The Curve Finance team has confirmed which pools were affected in the latest multi-million dollar exploit due to a Vyper vulnerability.

entry.title: Meme Coin Mania Drives Degens to Base, the Ethereum Level-2 Chain from Coinbase
entry.summary: Meme coins like BALD, COIN, and BASED sparked activity on Coinbase’s new Ethereum layer-2 network.

entry.title: Advanced AI Needs Machines That Learn More Like Humans
entry.summary: 'Catastrophic forgetting' could be a problem for applications like self-driving cars.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: Embattled U.S. Rep. George Santos Pitched Crypto Deal to Donor: NYT
entry.summary: The donor compared the proposal to the classic “Nigerian prince” email scam.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: Attackers Steal $24 Million From Several DeFi Projects in Curve Pool Exploits
entry.summary: The exploits appear to be rooted in an issue with Vyper, an alternative programming language for smart contracts.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Will Musk’s Everything App 'X' Tap Crypto for Payments?
entry.summary: OpenAI and Worldcoin founder Sam Altman proudly shared footage of people queuing up to have their eyeballs scanned for crypto.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Faces Bail Revocation Over Diary Leak, Witness Tampering Accusations
entry.summary: Federal prosecutors say "no set of release conditions will assure the safety of the community."

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: Baron Davis Wants a Player-Owned NBA Team. Can This Pro-Sailing League Get Him There?
entry.summary: NBA star Baron Davis is hoping a new DAO-run, pro sailing team will prove what he’s been saying for years: teams can be better run by fans than by elites.

entry.title: Pryce Adade Yebesi's Utopia Labs: Democratizing Access to Financial Instruments
entry.summary: With a fresh $23 million raised, Yebesi and his team at Utopia Labs are moving from DAOs to payment tools for marginalized communities.

entry.title: AI Can Find Signs of Disease in MRI Scans That Doctors Might Miss
entry.summary: Twinn Health is focused on metabolic diseases like diabetes, high blood pressure, and obesity.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: Human Rights Foundation Backs Bug Bounty With Bitcoin
entry.summary: Chief Strategy Officer Alex Gladstein said the challenge will speed development of features sought by global activists.

entry.title: Greg Rutkowski Was Removed From Stable Diffusion, But AI Artists Brought Him Back
entry.summary: More popular than Picasso and Leonardo Da Vinci among AI artists, Greg Rutkowski opted out of the Stable Diffusion training set. The community just created a LoRA to mimic his style.

entry.title: Gucci Reveals Rewards for Vault Material NFT Holders
entry.summary: "Rewarding a community is never a bad idea," says one holder, as luxury brands expand into Web3.

entry.title: 'If I Die, Delete My Browser History'—OperaGX Makes Good on the Meme
entry.summary: Opera introduces an AI-powered tool to automatically change your browser history to more acceptable content after you die.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Weak Week for Bitcoin and Ethereum—and Worldcoin
entry.summary: It was another slow week for crypto prices as another hike by the Federal Reserve took interest rates to a 22-year-high.

entry.title: What Makes a Blue-Chip Stablecoin?
entry.summary: Top stablecoins earn their marks with non-profit rating agency Bluechip rolling out its take on Tether, DAI, and Binance's BUSD.

entry.title: Paris Hilton-Backed Metaverse Company Settles Sexual Harassment Lawsuits
entry.summary: Two former director-level executives and one product manager have now resolved their disputes against virtual land builder Everyrealm.

entry.title: Solana Wants to Lead the Crypto Gaming Charge—Here's How
entry.summary: At the PlayGG event, the Solana Foundation shared its strategy for changing the rough narrative around blockchain games.

entry.title: What is Solana? A Scalable, Decentralized Network for Dapps
entry.summary: Solana boasts impressive speeds and a burgeoning dapp ecosystem, but it's still on the proving grounds.

entry.title: Com2uS Is Going "Full Speed" on Crypto Gaming: Kyu Lee
entry.summary: Kyu Lee is the President of game studio Com2uS USA. In an interview, he shares the studio's approach to Web3 and crypto gaming with Decrypt GG's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: SHIB Devs Begin Testing Shibarium to Ethereum Bridge
entry.summary: Shibarium is one step closer to launch, and Doge-themed meme coins are reaping the benefits.

entry.title: SEC Issues Warning Over Misleading Crypto 'Audits'
entry.summary: The SEC warned accounting firms working as crypto “auditors” could be censured or suspended if they're linked to misleading marketing.

entry.title: Optimism Hits New All-Time High for Daily Transactions Amid Worldcoin Launch
entry.summary: Data indicates that activity on the layer-2 network has been increasing since Q2 2023, accelerated by the launch of Worldcoin.

entry.title: Cannabis and Code: Generative Art Show Takes Over NYC's 'Luxury' Dispensary
entry.summary: Gotham, one of New York City's few cannabis dispensaries, hosted NFT art gallery Bright Moments for a live minting event.

entry.title: AI-Driven Generative Art: Art That Responds to Input
entry.summary: Code Canvas and Art Blocks are examples of platforms built with the assistance of blockchain tools which allow users to quickly and easily mint high-quality NFTs.

entry.title: France and Germany Coordinating on Worldcoin Investigation
entry.summary: On Friday, French privacy watchdog CNIL said the legality of Worldcoin's approach "seems questionable."

entry.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.

entry.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO
entry.summary: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussy unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.

entry.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor
entry.summary: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.

entry.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect
entry.summary: OpenZeppelin's security solutions architect Michael Lewellen sat down with Decrypt to discuss how the industry can become a little safer for users at this year's EthCC Paris. The key? Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.

entry.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies
entry.summary: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.

entry.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead
entry.summary: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.

entry.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder
entry.summary: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.

entry.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta
entry.summary: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.

entry.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.

entry.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO
entry.summary: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.

entry.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.

entry.title: 100 Thieves' Moe Says Blockchain Games Will 'Eventually' Be Accepted by Livestreamers
entry.summary: 100 Thieves content creator and gamer Moe also goes by "Yassuo" online after his favorite League of Legends character. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks him about 100 Thieves' future crypto plans and whether Moe thinks creators like xQc and Pokimane might ever come around to blockchain games.

entry.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder
entry.summary: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.

entry.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?
entry.summary: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.

entry.title: Ex-Activision VP Michael Lee: Gaming Is Crypto's 'Killer App'
entry.summary: Former Activision Vice President Michael Lee is now the SVP of Growth at Matter Labs. At the 3XP gaming conference, Lee sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss crypto gaming and give his predictions for the industry.

entry.title: Behind the Scenes with AMGI Studios and My Pet Hooligan
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes to Burbank, California for a behind-the-scenes tour of AMGI Studios, the developers of upcoming game My Pet Hooligan.
